verses.text: \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* Gerson, Caath, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.
\w The|strong="H8034"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Caath: Amram, Isaar, Hebron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Oziel.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*: Aaron, Moses, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Mary. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: Nadab \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abiu, Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.
Eleazar beget Phinees, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Phinees beget Abisue,
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Abisue beget Bocci, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Bocci begot Ozi.
Ozi beget Zaraias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Zaraias beget Maraioth.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Maraioth beget Amarias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Amarias beget Achitob.
Achitob beget Sadoc, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sadoc begot Achimaas.
Achimaas beget Azarias, Azarias begot Johanan,

Johanan beget Azarias. This \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* executed \w the|strong="H1121"\w* priestly office \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house which Solomon built \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Azarias beget Amarias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Amarias beget Achitob.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Achitob beget Sadoc, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sadoc beget Sellum,
Sellum beget Helcias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Helcias beget Azarias,
Azarias beget Saraias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Saraias beget Josedec.

Now Josedec went out, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord carried away Juda, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem, \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hands \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nabuchodonosor.
\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Levi \w were|strong="H0834"\w* Gerson, Caath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Merari.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* these \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* names \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Gerson: Lobni \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Semei.
\w The|strong="H5975"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Caath: Amram, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Isaar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hebron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Oziel.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Merari: Moholi \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Musi. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* these \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* kindreds \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* their \w families|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Gerson: Lobni \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jahath \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zamma \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Joah \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Addo \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zara \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jethrai \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Caath, Aminadab \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Core \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Asir \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Elcana \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Abiasaph \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Asir \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Thahath \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uriel \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Ozias \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Saul \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.
\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana: Amasai, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Achimoth.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana: Sophai \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Nahath \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Eliab \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jeroham \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Elcana \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.
\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Samuel: \w the|strong="H1121"\w* firstborn Vasseni, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abia.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, Moholi: Lobni \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Semei \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Oza \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Sammaa \w his|strong="H0558"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Haggia \w his|strong="H0558"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Asaia \w his|strong="H0558"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* they, whom David set over \w the|strong="H1121"\w* singing \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord, after \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* ark \w was|strong="H1121"\w* placed:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* they ministered before \w the|strong="H1121"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* testimony, with singing, until Solomon built \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they stood according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* order \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* ministry.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* stood \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* sons, \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Caath, Hemam \w a|strong="H5414"\w* singer, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Joel, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Sammuel,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jeroham, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliel, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Thohu,

\w The|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Suph, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mahath, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amasai,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elcana, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Johel, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azarias, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sophonias,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Thahath, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asir, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* Abiasaph, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core,

\w The|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isaar, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Caath, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* brother Asaph, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* stood \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w right|strong="H0175"\w* hand, Asaph \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Barachias, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Samaa.
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Michael, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Basaia, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Melchia.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Athanai, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zara, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Adaia.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ethan, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zamma, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Semei.
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Jeth, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Gerson, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Levi.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Merari their brethren, on \w the|strong="H0853"\w* left hand, Ethan \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Cusi, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Abdi, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Meloch,
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Hasabia, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Amasai, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Helcias,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amasai, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Boni, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Somer,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Moholi, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mud, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Merari, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi.

\w Their|strong="H8147"\w* brethren also \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Levites, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* appointed \w for|strong="H1121"\w* all \w the|strong="H1121"\w* ministry \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord.

\w But|strong="H3881"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H3478"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* holocausts, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* incense, \w for|strong="H5414"\w* very \w work|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* holies: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* pray \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* according \w to|strong="H3478"\w* all \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* commanded.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: Eleazar \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Phinees \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Abisue \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Bocci \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Ozi \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zarahia \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Meraioth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son, Amarias \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son, Achitob \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son,
Sadoc his son, Achimaas his son.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* these are their dwelling places by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* towns \w and|strong="H4054"\w* confines, \w to|strong="H0853"\w* wit, \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Aaron, \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* families \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Caathites: for they fell \w to|strong="H0853"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* by lot.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* they gave \w them|strong="H0853"\w* Hebron \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* suburbs thereof round about:

But \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fields \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* city, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* villages \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Caleb \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jephone.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Aaron they gave \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cities for refuge Hebron, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Lobna, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* suburbs thereof,

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* Jether \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Esthemo, \w with|strong="H0853"\w* their suburbs, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Helon, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Dabir \w with|strong="H0853"\w* their suburbs:
Asan \w also|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Bethsames, \w with|strong="H4294"\w* their suburbs.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Benjamin: Gabee \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* suburbs, Almath \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* suburbs, Anathoth \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* suburbs: all their cities throughout their families were thirteen.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Caath \w that|strong="H4294"\w* remained \w of|strong="H4294"\w* their kindred they gave \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* half \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Manasses ten cities \w in|strong="H6943"\w* \w possession|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Gerson \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Issachar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aser, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nephtali, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Basan, thirteen cities.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Merari by their families \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Ruben, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Gad, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Zabulon, they gave by lot twelve cities.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Israel gave \w to|strong="H6932"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Levites \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cities, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* their suburbs.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* they gave \w them|strong="H0853"\w* by lot, \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Simeon, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Benjamin, these cities which they called by their names.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H0853"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* that were \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* kindred \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Caath, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cities in their borders were \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Ephraim.
And they gave the cities of refuge Sichem with its suburbs in mount Ephraim, and Gazer with its suburbs,
Jecmaan also with its suburbs, and Beth-horon in like manner,
Helon also with its suburbs, and Gethremmon in like manner,
And out of the half tribe of Manasses, Aner and its suburbs, Baalam and its suburbs: to wit, to them that were left of the family of the sons of Caath.
And to the sons of Gersom, out of the kindred of the half tribe of Manasses, Gaulon, in Basan, and its suburbs, and Astharoth with its suburbs.
Out of the tribe of Issachar, Cedes and its suburbs, and Dabereth with its suburbs;
Ramoth also and its suburbs, and Anem with its suburbs.
And out of the tribe of Aser: Masal with its suburbs, and Abdon in like manner;
Hucac also and its suburbs, and Rohol with its suburbs.
And out of the tribe of Nephtali, Cedes in Galilee and its suburbs, Hamon with its suburbs, and Cariathaim, and its suburbs.
And to the sons of Merari that remained: out of the tribe of Zabulon, Remmono and its suburbs, and Thabor with its suburbs.
Beyond the Jordan also over against Jericho, on the east side of the Jordan, out of the tribe of Ruben, Bosor in the wilderness with its suburbs, and Jassa with its suburbs;
Cademoth also and its suburbs, and Mephaath with its suburbs;
Moreover also out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Galaad and its suburbs, and Manaim with its suburbs;
Hesebon also with its suburbs, and Jazer with its suburbs.
